entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 08:02 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: S 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then southwest 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
